news_header: Antti Koivula discusses the challenges of remote work and its impact on younger generations in the workforce.
news_text: Antti Koivula, Director General of the Finnish Institute for Occupational Health, highlights the negative aspects of remote work that have emerged recently. He emphasizes the challenge of integrating younger workers, trained during the pandemic, into the workforce, noting that they face different challenges than previous generations. The debate on remote work has intensified, revealing that while some remote workers thrive, many companies and communities suffer from a lack of innovation and community. Koivula urges companies to understand their unique situations and develop a suitable long-term operating model.
